ValidationRule.description: Forces users to use a product type that was selected in the Transaction Type field.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(OR( AND( INCLUDES(Opportunity.Transaction_Type__c, "Rental"), CONTAINS(TEXT(Product_Record_Type__c), "Rental") ), AND( INCLUDES(Opportunity.Transaction_Type__c, "Sale"), CONTAINS(TEXT(Product_Record_Type__c), "Sale") ), AND( INCLUDES(Opportunity.Transaction_Type__c, "Operations"), CONTAINS(TEXT(Product_Record_Type__c), "Operations") ), AND( INCLUDES(Opportunity.Transaction_Type__c, "Recurring Non-Rental"), CONTAINS(TEXT(Product_Record_Type__c), "Sublease (Recurring Non-Rental)") ), AND( INCLUDES(Opportunity.Transaction_Type__c, "Lodging"), CONTAINS(TEXT(Product_Record_Type__c), "Lodging") ) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select a previously selected transaction type as product.
